form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: APPLICATION FOR ISSUANCE OR EXTENSION OF PERMIT TO REENTER THE UNITED STATES

full_text: Screened bv NARA 9/21/2023 UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE Form approved. Immigration and Naturalization Service OMB No 43-R0052. #MMI 107 FEE STAMP APPLICATION FOR ISSUANCE OR EXTENSION OF PERMIT TO REENTER THE UNITED STATES as provided in section 223 of the Immigration and Nationality Act Los 152127 Use typewriter or print in block letters with ball -point pen. issuance I hereby apply for (check one) of Permit to Reenter the United States extension FAMILY NAME (Capital Letters) FIRST MIDDLE 1. YOUR NAME IMPORTANT: You must submit your Alien Registration Receipt CHAN NUI Card with this application if you checked 'Issuance'' above. C/O IN CARE OF If you checked 'Extension' you must submit the reentry per- mit you wish to have extended. (No. and Street) (Apt. No.) MAILING 790 Fairfield Circle ALIEN REGISTRATION NUMBER ADDRESS (State) IN U.S. (C4x) Pasadena, California 191106 A- 17 195 429 FILL IN ITEMS 2 THROUGH 6 ONLY IF APPLICATION IS FOR ISSUANCE OF REENTRY PERMIT 2. DATE OF BIRTH(Month, Day. Year) COUNTRY OF BIRTH COUNTRY OF CLAIMED NATIONALITY COLOR OF EYES COLOR OF HAIR March 6, 1915 China Republic of China brown black HEIGHT 5 FEET 2 INCHES VISIBLE MARKS AND SCARS 3. I DID DID NOT REGISTER FOR SELECTIVE SERVICE female 4. FILL IN THE ITEMS IN THIS BLOCK AS TO first ARRIVAL IN UNITED STATES FOR PERMANENT RESIDENCE OR ADJUSTMENT TO PERMA NENT RESIDENT STATUS NAME UNDER WHICH ADMITTED OR ADJUSTED PORT OF ARRIVAL OR LOCATION OF DATE OF ABRIVAL OR DATE AS OF IMMIGRATION OFFICE WHICH WHICH ADJUSTMENT OF STATUS NUI CHAN GRANTED ADJUSTMENT S GRANTED Honolulu May 1969 FILL IN REMAINING ITEMS IN THIS BLOCK ONLY IF YOU DID NOT ACQUIRE PERMANENT RESIDENCE THROUGH ADJUSTMENT MANNER OF FIRST ARRIVAL IN UNITED STATES FOR PERMANENT RESIDENCE (Name of Vessel, Airline, etc.) British Airways FATHER'S NAME AT TIME OF YOUR ARRIVAL MOTHER'S MAIDEN NAME with CHAN YIU CHANG SHEE MIN 5. FILL IN THE ITEMS IN THIS BLOCK AS TO last ARRIVAL IN U.S. (Exclude any re-entry after an absence of less than six months in Canada or Mexico.) NAME UNDER WHICH ADMITTED PORT OF ARRIVAL DATE OF ARRIVAL NUI CHAN Honolulu Max June 76 NAME OF VESSEL, AIRLINE OR OTHER MEANS OF CONVEYANCE: Korean A r Lines 6. PORT OF proposed DEPARTURE FROM UNITED STATES DATE OF proposed DEPARTURE LENGTH OF INTENDED ABSENCE ABROAD Los Angeles June 1, 1979 * about 14 months NAME OF TRANSPORTATION COMPANY IF DEPARTURE IS TO BE BY VESSEL GIVE NAME OF VESSEL Pan American Airways will wait for my permit before I leave FILL, IN ITEM 7, ONLY IF APPLICATION IS FOR EXTENSION OF REENTRY PERMIT 7. List all countries visited since your last departure from the United States in the order visited DATE & PORT OF LAST DEPARTURE FROM U.S. Hong Kong May, 1976 8. FILL IN ITEM 8 ONLY IF YOU HAVE PREVIOUSLY OBTAINED A PERMIT TO REENTER ISSUANCE DATE OF LAST PERMIT LOCATION OF IMMIGRATION AND INATURALIZATION OFFICE ISSUING LAST PERMIT MY LAST PERMIT (City and State) IS ATTACHED Oct. 20,1975 Los Angeles, Calif. IS NOT ATTACHED IF THE PERMIT IS NOT ATTACHED, STATE REASON: IF PERMIT IS ATTACHED, STATE EXPIRATION DATE lost ALL APPLICANTS MUST FILL IN ITEMS 9 THROUGH 20, INCLUSIVE 9. PRESENT OCCUPATION: NAME and ADDRESS OF EMPLOYER housekeeper SOCIAL SECURITY ACCOUNT NUMBER Mrs. Paschall 551-94-5538 790 Fairfield Circle, Pasadena, 10. MAILING ADDRESS ABROA D (Number and Street) (City/Town) Calisier Di strict) 91106 Country) 847 Block 9, 8th Fl. , Ngau Tau Kok R/E/ Kowloon, Hong Kong 11. COUNTRIES TO BE VISITED (List each country) Hong Kong 12. REASONS FOR GOING ABROAD OR SEEKING EXTENSION (Be concise and complete): pleasure and to see my relatives RECEIVED TRANS IN RET'D-TRANS.OUT COMPLETED FORM 1-131 (Rev. 4-1-76)N OVER
